cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.10)
project(external)

list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake_modules")

option(ENABLE_BOOST "Enable Boost" ON)
option(ENABLE_CVRPSEP "Enable CVRPSEP" ON)
option(ENABLE_EIGEN "Enable Eigen" ON)
option(ENABLE_GUROBI "Enable Gurobi" ON)
option(ENABLE_XGB "Enable XGBoost" ON)

if (ENABLE_BOOST)
    find_package(BOOST REQUIRED)
    set(BOOST_INCLUDE_DIRS ${BOOST_INCLUDE_DIRS} PARENT_SCOPE)
endif ()

if (ENABLE_CVRPSEP)
    find_package(CVRPSEP REQUIRED)
    set(CVRPSEP_INCLUDE_DIRS ${CVRPSEP_INCLUDE_DIRS} PARENT_SCOPE)
    set(CVRPSEP_LIBRARIES ${CVRPSEP_LIBRARIES} PARENT_SCOPE)
endif ()

if (ENABLE_EIGEN)
    find_package(EIGEN REQUIRED)
    set(EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIRS ${EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIRS} PARENT_SCOPE)
endif ()

if (ENABLE_GUROBI)
    find_package(GUROBI REQUIRED)
    set(GUROBI_INCLUDE_DIRS ${GUROBI_INCLUDE_DIRS} PARENT_SCOPE)
    set(GUROBI_LIBRARIES ${GUROBI_LIBRARIES} PARENT_SCOPE)
endif ()

if (ENABLE_XGB)
    find_package(XGB REQUIRED)
    set(XGB_INCLUDE_DIRS ${XGB_INCLUDE_DIRS} PARENT_SCOPE)
    set(XGB_LIBRARIES ${XGB_LIBRARIES} PARENT_SCOPE)
endif ()
